registration.introduction: Welcome! Please insert the following information:

classes.select: Select the classification of your point.

messages.registrationSuccess: Thank you! Now you can start to contribute!
messages.markerPopup: Not your current location? Drag the marker to correct!
messages.contributionSuccess: Thank you very much for the contribution!
messages.allNoInternet: The map displaying all people's contributions can not be shown due to no Internet Connection!
messages.registrationNoInternet: Registration fails due to no Internet connection!
messages.gpsError: GPS error! Please drag the marker to set your current location!
messages.contributionSuccessNoInternet: Thank you for the contribution. Note that you are currently in offline mode, please re-open the app once you have Internet connection to share your contributions.
messages.photoUnavailable: Taking photo is available only on Android and iOS apps, and not from browsers.
messages.bingNoInternet: Bing Aerial cannot be displayed due to no Internet connection!
messages.osmNoInternet: OpenStreetMap cannot be displayed due to no Internet connection!
messages.storageError: This browser does not support local storage.
messages.privateMode: Error! Are you in private mode?

stat.contrAllSingle: contribution within 5 km of your current location.
stat.contrAllPlural: contributions within 5 km of your current location.
stat.noContrMy: You have not had any contribution yet!
stat.noContrAll: No body has added a contribution within 5 km of your current location.
